vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
ἐμπορπ-άω,
fasten with a brooch or pin:—passive, εἵματα ἐνεπορπέατο (Ionic dialect for -ηντο) they wore garments fastened with a brooch upon the shoulder, [LXX+5th c.BC+]
vocabInfos.shortDef: fastened with a brooch upon the shoulder
vocabInfos.mediumDef: fastened with a brooch upon the shoulder
vocabInfos.stepGloss: to fastened with a brooch upon the shoulder
